attributes.action: prosecute Hazel Blears for Tax evasion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This woman went before the cameras with her condescending grin and said she was sending a cheque for £13,000 to the inland revenue for payment of capital gains from the sale of a second property. This is tantamount to admitting that she had actively evaded paying the tax in the first place. If I had done that I would be prosecuted, she should be as well. She is not above the law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
